attributes.additional_details:
Say no to the siting of wind turbines at Tawstock (Hollamoor Farm) on the edge of Barnstaple North Devon. Help preserve the towns outlook and beautiful surroundings.

Mosscliff Environmental have plans to build three wind turbines at Hollamoor Farm, between Barnstaple and Tawstock. Each turbine will have a maximum height to the tip of the turning blade of 75m.

To find out more about the plans, visit www.mosscliff.co.uk.

Register your objection below to stop this noisy and unsightly blot on our landscape.
